import { Component} from '@angular/core'; import { Router} from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent { constructor(private router: Router){} collapsed = true; goToPart(fragment:string){ this.router.navigateByUrl('#' + fragment); } }
